name: Bomberman Live: Battlefest
summary: Bomberman Live: Battlefest is a 2010 video game for the Xbox 360 console, Battlefest was released on December 8, 2010 through Xbox Live Arcade. It is the last Bomberman game to be published by Hudson Soft and was the last Bomberman game until 2017 with the release of Super Bomberman R.
info:
• 中文名: 炸弹人Live：战斗集会
  • 发行: ハドソン
  • 平台: Xbox360
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 8人
  • 发行日期: 2010年12月8日
